item.description:
Water's Edge is having their 8th annual Fireworks Celebration...and YOU are invited. What a great way to spend an evening! Al Fresco dinging at the Sunset Bar & Grill...Live Entertainment starting @ 5pm...Fireworks at Dusk...and a scrumptious buffet dinner is offered.See the menu below:


Waterâ€™s Edge Resort & Spa 2010 Fireworks Dinner Buffet Menu
Tuesday, July 5, 2010 Seating Starting at 5:30pm

Caesar Salad Station With Traditional Accompaniments
Tuscan Grilled Marinated Vegetable Salad
Roasted Garlic Balsamic Vinaigrette, Fresh Basil Pesto
Vine Ripened Tomato & Fresh Mozzarella Salad
Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Cracked Black Pepper
Pineapple Teriyaki Glazed London Broil
Wilted Summer Greens
Fire Grilled Breast of Marinated Chicken
Blood Orange BBQ Glaze, Black Bean & Grilled Corn Salsa
Crab and Boursin Stuffed Filet of Sole
Lemon Zest and Caper Beurre Blanc
Roasted Garlic Whipped Yukon Gold Potatoes
Green Beans and Roasted Red Bell Peppers
Chocolate Mousse Cake
New York Style Cheesecake

Dinner Buffet ~ $29.00++ per person

So come enjoy the evening with your friends...or meet new ones!!!

(Above Pricing Does Not Reflect Tax & Service Charge

You can do the buffet but you will have to call the resort and pay for it online in advance. Just tell them you want the Meetup/Bruno table. HOWEVER, I will not be doing the buffet. You can bring snacks to share but please be discreet about it. NO COOLERS, PLEASE.

I am going to go early and try to snag seating at the white wrought iron gazebo. It was the best spot in the place last year, and we had it! I 'm hoping to pull it off again. Look for the red and blue balloon. If you need to contact me, my cell is 203-808-5829.
item.name: 8th Annual Fireworks Display at Water's Edge Resort...
